What is the future for Israel-Palestine relations?

In 2009, Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gave a speech at Bar Ilan University advocating a two state-solution. On the 7th October he proclaimed that Israel's occupation is not a cause of war, fuelling observers' mistrust about his intentions with regards to the West Bank.

By James Bithell
